Body.Content:
We previously announced that the ability to view usage and value metrics for Copilot agents in Power Apps in the Copilot hub within the Power Platform admin center would reach general availability on June 15, 2025. This feature was delayed and started rollout to be generally available on July 28, 2025.

How does this affect me?
Admins will be able to utilize a new, dedicated product page for Power Apps in the Copilot hub within the Power Platform admin center to view usage and value metrics for Copilot in Power Apps. In the initial release, usage data will be available for the data exploration agent. In the future, we plan to add usage data for additional Copilot agents.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

To learn more, please visit Track, manage, and scale Copilot adoption in the Power Platform.

Title: [Updated] Power Platform admin center - View usage and value metrics for Copilot agents in Power Apps
